snippet.title: Badanamu First Step Game Trailer l Nursery Rhymes & Kids Songs
snippet.description:
This application works best with the Badanamu Learning Pen Set. 
Please check www.badanamu.com for availability.

Carefully designed by educators and parents to help children prepare for preschool and kindergarten. 

Shapes
• Help the Badanamu friends build interesting creations with circles, squares, and triangles.
• Learn vocabulary for shapes names and the items that you build: circle, square, triangle, train, helicopter, boat, and many more.

Numbers
• Learn to count from 1 to 5 by matching Badanamu friends to items they need.
• Learn the value of numbers by giving the correct number of train tickets Badanamu friends. 

Letters
• Learn single letter sounds and shapes
• Match letters and sounds for 3-letter words

Does your little one love Badanamu First Step? Is there something you would like to see changed? We would love to hear what you think about our application. Simply leave a review below or send us an email. 

Badanamu has a whole world of learning just waiting for children to discover. Follow us on one of our social media accounts to hear the latest about our products and animations.
• Website: www.badanamu.com
• YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/badanamu
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Badanamu1
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/badanamu

About Badanamu:
Badanamu started with an idea to change the world of early learning. Young children can learn and engage with ESL, phonics, and STEM lessons through our educational songs and nursery rhymes. 

We create high-quality, educational songs for you and your kids to enjoy together. Learn about animals, colors, numbers, and much more! It’s time to embark on a playful adventure full of love and discovery with the cute and adorable Badanamu friends. 

Social Media

『 Our Website: https://badanamu.com/  』
『 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Badanamu1?re  』
『 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/badanamu/  』
『 Amazon Store: https://www.amazon.com/badanamu  』

Playlists  

『 Badanamu Phonics 』
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzAVL_ayaL5QmIIJ9TLJFVRIGXiig0hQJ
『 Badanamu Compilations 』
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzAVL_ayaL5TRvXjdA0eWUObHXGEC3Gum
『 Badanamu POP 』
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzAVL_ayaL5Q2zlwC3kluDjkYPyHKhTDg

Video Tags

#Badanamu 
#nurseryrhymes  #kidssongs  #childrensongs  #babysongs #funsongs 
#earlychildhoodeducation #preschool #English #education 
#phonics #ponytail #ABC
